adDetails: http://www.quickncleanmobile.com About There's more to janitorial services than a mop hitting the floor. Environmental concerns and new technologies have taken commercial cleaning service to a new level. Quick 'N' Clean combines today's technology. Description We offer cleaning services specific to your needs: 1-7 days/week availability hard surface floor care restrooms carpet care ...phones and exposed surfaces disinfection dusting special event clean-up spring cleaning emergency clean-up day porters window washing post-construction clean-up auto-detail upholsterySee More Mission "Quick 'N' Clean is dedicated to providing the exact services our commercial cleaning clients need, sticking closely to their expectations, taking a pro-active approach in identifying their needs, and creating the best partnership possible. The company is also committed to performing with honesty and integrity at all times and in all aspects of our business, to being professional in completing our job, and to providing a consistent, high standard work quality." Quick 'N' Clean is a premier commercial cleaning company servicing the Bay Area and Los Banos As such, one of our missions is to provide quality service for a quality price. Another very important mission of Quick 'N' Clean is to always put the customer first. It is our belief that our customers are our number one priority and that good customer service is built on a foundation of trust and integrity. We further believe that it is a refreshing change for businesses to be able to utilize a company who honestly listens to their needs, takes the time to address all of their concerns and completes a job precisely. We take pride in our ability to give the customer the individual attention they deserve, in order to achieve aesthetic perfection. Our representatives are professional service people. Our employees are proud, responsible and dedicated members of the Quick 'N' Clean team who are held in high regards. They are one of the many reasons why we are able to take satisfaction in our work and honor in our name. "Professionals Servicing Professionals" is how we envision our business relationships. For quality and care, you know that we'll be there - Quick 'N' Clean call us at show contact info
